[Home](./index.md) &gt; [validate-azure-ad-token](./validate-azure-ad-token.md) &gt; [IValidationOptions](./validate-azure-ad-token.ivalidationoptions.md) &gt; [applicationId](./validate-azure-ad-token.ivalidationoptions.applicationid.md)

## IValidationOptions.applicationId property

Only present in v1.0 tokens. The application ID of the client using the token. The application can act as itself or on behalf of a user. The application ID typically represents an application object, but it can also represent a service principal object in Azure AD.

**Signature:**

```typescript
applicationId: string;
```
